/p/system/packages/intel/parallel_studio_xe_2018_update1/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mpi/intel64/bin/mpiicc -fPIC -axCORE-AVX2 -mtune=broadwell -fp-model precise -DMULTIPASS_TEST_1_petsc_works_minimal    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/cmTC_e9157.dir/src.c.o  -o cmTC_e9157 -Wl,-rpath,/home/albrecht/software/petsc-intel-2018/linux-intel-64bit/lib /home/albrecht/software/petsc-intel-2018/linux-intel-64bit/lib/libpetsc.so
